Setting Server Ports

Server ports handle data traffic between the fabric interconnect and the adapter cards on the servers. You can only configure server ports on the fixed port module. Expansion modules do not include server ports.

To set the Server Ports, perform the following:

 1. In the Server Port, select the Number of Chassis from the drop-down list and click Add. Based upon the number of chassis selected and the links specified in action of chassis discovery policy the servers ports are generated.

Figure 4-3 Server Ports

 2. Click Save and next to save the server port settings.
